title: Optimization framework for redox flow battery electrodes with improved microstructural characteristics
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00248B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Alina Berkowitz, Ashley A. Caiado, Sundar Rajan Aravamuthan, Aaron Roy, Ertan Agar, Murat Inalpolat
This research aims to advance the field of vanadium redox flow batteries (VRFBs) by introducing a pioneering approach to optimize the microstructural characteristics of carbon cloth electrodes.
